name: Kevin Goes to Scotland
description:
KGTS is an text-adventure game made while I was an exchange student in Edinburgh back in 2014. I wrote it in contemplation of my come back in France to avoid the perpetual talks about my stay.

My exchange was a long succession of choices, coincidences, opportunities and regrets. So this game is about asking the player : What would you have done ?

Featuring : Flat-hunting, language barrier, loneliness, football, parties, alcohol, alcohol and alcohol.

You can play the game here or download it to play it offline.

---

Please consider donating, as I'm planning to travel more and make games about my trips. Thanks, and have a nice time playing ! :)
